data.name: advanced-audit-history-dropdown-placeholder
data.value: Choose fields to filter the audit history

data.name: restore-description
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the selected record(s)?

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-search-tooltip-text
data.value: Search and filter audit records by user names, field names, field values, or operation details. Results update in real-time as you type. Click the X icon to clear the search.
data.comment: Tooltip for the search input in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-viewtype-tooltip-text
data.value: Switch between different view layouts for audit records. Card view displays detailed information in expandable cards, while Card-Timeline view adds chronological ordering with visual timeline markers.
data.comment: Tooltip for the view type selector in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-analytics-tooltip-text
data.value: View comprehensive analytics dashboard with visual charts, trend analysis, and compliance monitoring. See audit activity over time, top changed fields, most active users, and change frequency patterns.
data.comment: Tooltip for the analytics dashboard button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-filters-tooltip-text
data.value: Apply advanced filters to narrow down audit records by user, action type, or specific changes. Quickly find the exact audit trail you need.
data.comment: Tooltip for the filters button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-clear-filters-tooltip-text
data.value: Clear all active filters and reset to default view. This will remove user, attribute, action type, operation, and date range filters.
data.comment: Tooltip for the clear all filters button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-refresh-tooltip-text
data.value: Refresh audit history data to see the latest changes. This will reload all audit records based on your current filter settings.
data.comment: Tooltip for the refresh button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-export-tooltip-text
data.value: Export audit history data to different file formats. Choose Excel for detailed spreadsheets with formatting, CSV for raw data import, or PDF for printable reports and documentation.
data.comment: Tooltip for the export menu in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-settings-tooltip-text
data.value: Configure display options, enable auto-refresh, manage field visibility settings, and customize your audit history viewing experience.
data.comment: Tooltip for the settings button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-maximize-tooltip-text
data.value: Maximize the audit history view to full screen for better visibility and focus. Press Escape to exit full screen mode.
data.comment: Tooltip for the maximize button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-search-placeholder-text
data.comment: Placeholder text for the search input in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-sort-ascending-tooltip-text
data.value: Sort audit records by date. Currently sorted in ascending order. Click to toggle between ascending and descending order.
data.comment: Tooltip for the sort button when in ascending order

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-sort-descending-tooltip-text
data.value: Sort audit records by date. Currently sorted in descending order. Click to toggle between ascending and descending order.
data.comment: Tooltip for the sort button when in descending order

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-viewtype-aria-label
data.comment: ARIA label for the view type selector button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-analytics-aria-label
data.comment: ARIA label for the analytics dashboard button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-toolbar-export-aria-label
data.comment: ARIA label for the export menu button in the toolbar

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-no-permission-title
data.comment: Title for the error panel when user does not have permission to view audit history

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-no-permission-message
data.value: You do not have permission to view audit history. Please contact your system administrator to request access.
data.comment: Message for the error panel when user does not have permission to view audit history

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-audit-not-enabled-title
data.comment: Title for the error panel when audit logging is not enabled for the entity

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-audit-not-enabled-message
data.value: Audit logging is not enabled for this entity. Please enable auditing in the entity settings to track changes.
data.comment: Message for the error panel when audit logging is not enabled for the entity

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-no-audit-data-title
data.comment: Title for the error panel when no audit data is available for the entity

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-no-audit-data-message
data.value: No audit history records found for this entity. Changes may not have been tracked yet, or audit logging might not be enabled for this entity.
data.comment: Message for the error panel when no audit data is available for the entity

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-default-title
data.comment: Default title for the error panel when no specific error type matches

data.name: advanced-audit-history-error-panel-default-message
data.comment: Default message for the error panel when no specific error type matches

data.name: advanced-audit-history-table-cell-field-tooltip
data.value: The name of the field that was changed in this audit record
data.comment: Tooltip for the Field column header in the audit attributes table

data.name: advanced-audit-history-table-cell-field-type-tooltip
data.value: The data type of the field (e.g., String, Lookup, DateTime, Money)
data.comment: Tooltip for the Field Type column header in the audit attributes table

data.name: advanced-audit-history-table-cell-old-value-tooltip
data.value: The previous value of the field before the change was made
data.comment: Tooltip for the Old Value column header in the audit attributes table

data.name: advanced-audit-history-table-cell-new-value-tooltip
data.value: The new value of the field after the change was made
data.comment: Tooltip for the New Value column header in the audit attributes table

data.name: advanced-audit-history-table-cell-action-tooltip
data.value: Restore individual field values to their previous state from this audit entry
data.comment: Tooltip for the Action column header in the audit attributes table
